text:
Aaron Sorkin on Steve Jobs, the cult of Apple and that spat with Tim Cook 
Published By: Mashable - Today 
LONDON — Aaron Sorkin was “terrified” at the prospect of taking on the life of Steve Jobs for his latest movie — for several reasons... Read Full Story ... Related articles:
